author: hugo_delacruz
content:
We've just published a document describing a Code Merkleization implementation in geth, including code proof generation and verification (using FastSSZ), and an analysis of proof sizes for different proof implementations on ~1M mainnet blocks. It also has a description of how a similar experiment could be done verkle trees: 

https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/code-merkleization-implementation-analysis
